label: PMNS Delta CP Phase (Inverted Ordering)
mathematical_goal: Derive delta_CP for Inverted Ordering from G2 complex structure, comparing to NuFIT 6.0 IO (278.0 +/- 26 deg)
theoretical_significance: The CP-violating phase in Inverted Ordering is derived from the complex structure of the G2 manifold. The complex number z = 7.102 + 1.054i encodes the phase structure from flux compactification, giving delta_CP ~ 268 deg, in agreement with NuFIT 6.0 IO at -0.37 sigma level.
derivation_chain: G2 complex structure: z from flux compactification
